availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Lawrence Smith (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, chemistry professor)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, professor of chemistry. South Carolina native. Married to Sarah Julia Guthrie Smith in Jefferson County, Kentucky on June 24, 1852. Professor of chemistry in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 78.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819595, p. 229 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "J. Lawrence Smith (Dec 17, 1818-Oct 12, 1883)," Memorial #6947293, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6947293 (accessed May 12, 2020).
